title: Eternum Rek’Sai ravages a new world

replies.body: lol I have 100% win rate with {{champion:421}} :D
Trying him in bots I see
I'm missing a small amount of rp on my account and id like to buy the reksai skin :/. I've heard that riot has helped people out in such ways...any directions?
I got a $10 league card only to find out i was 2 rp away (1348) from getting the skin. I wish I had known that they could 'help you out' eariler.

ok rek sai came out like 3 days ago with his skin and riot puts the page up now

um a bit late cause 100s of people have his skin

not good enough rito
